```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
baseball <- read.csv('../data/baseball.csv')
str(baseball)
summary(baseball)
```

RS- 
OBP - On Base Percentage (aka OBP, On Base Average, OBA) is a measure of how often a batter reaches base.

```{r}
baseball %>% filter(Year >= 1996, Year < 2002)
filter(baseball, Year >= 1996, Year < 2002)
filter(baseball, League == 'AL' | League == 'NL')
```

```{r}
baseball %>%
  filter(Year > 1980, Year < 2000) %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  summarise(total_playoffs = sum(Playoffs, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total_playoffs))
```

```{r}
baseball %>%
  filter(Year > 1980, Year < 2000) %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  summarise(total_wins = sum(W, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total_wins))
```

```{r}
baseball %>%
  filter(Playoffs == 1) %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  summarise(total_wins = sum(W)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total_wins))
```
